titles.title: Modernizing Access to Our Public Oceans Act
Modernizing Access to Our Public Oceans Act
Modernizing Access to Our Public Oceans Act
A bill to provide for standardization, publication, and accessibility of data relating to public outdoor recreational use of Federal waterways, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Cruz with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 119-40.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 117.

committee.name: Senate Commerce, Science, and Transportation
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
